abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32667283, pmid32686851, pmid32657339, pmid32687400, pmid32609079, pmid32667208, pmid32706769, pmid32705115
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.08.03
